name: elimnvu
body: |- wcel(cif(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs), wcel(c0, cnv)), cnv)

comment: Hypothesis elimination lemma for normed complex vector spaces to assist weak deduction theorem. (Contributed by NM, 16-May-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
